title: Lenin's Russia
creator_credit: Educational Media International and Richard Dunn
brief_description: This film adopts a novel approach to Lenin’s Russia by using a debate between two university students on the use of book and film resources to investigate the period. The film includes authentic newsreel footage. It is involved in examining problems of historical methodology. Suitable for upper secondary level.
